Joël M'Maka Tchédré, bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Togo, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri, onye na-ede ihe nkiri. A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri dịka Pacte na T’Bool
Ọ bụkwa onye na-emepụta ihe, na onye nduzi ememme.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Stendhal, France na Creative Documentary
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị Baccalaureate n'afọ 2006, ọ debara aha na Mahadum Lomé iji mee akwụkwọ akụkọ. N'afọ 2014, o mepụtara Emergence Film Festival, na Lome
Ka ọ dịgodị, ọ ghọrọ onye nnọchi anya ma mesịa hiwe ụlọ mmepụta ihe ya nke a na-akpọ "Les Films du Siècle". Mgbe ahụ, ọ sonyeere telivishọn mba Togo dị ka onye na amụ amụ
Ka ọ dịgodị, o mere ule ịbanye na Superior School of Visual Arts (ESAV) nke Marrakech na Morocco
Mgbe ọ nabatara ule ahụ, ọ kwụsịrị nke ahụ wee kpebie ịkwaga Institut Supérieur des Métiers de l'Audio-visuels (ISMA) na Cotonou, Benin n'afọ 2009
Mgbe o ritere agụmakwụkwọ site na Embassy nke France, ọ gara France iji mee nzere masta na mmepụta ihe nkiri sinima nke Okike na Niger.

Mgbe ihe ịga nke ọma nke mkpụmkpụ ahụ gasịrị, ọ duziri ihe nkiri abụọ ọzọ: Ajoda, un vieux aux bras valides na Vues d'Afrique N'afọ 2019, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na sinima na ihe nkiri T'Bool, nke natara otuto dị mma site n'aka ndị nkatọ. Tupu ọ nweta nzere masta nke abụọ na Production na Grenoble, France na 2013, o mere obere ihe nkiri The films of the century
N'afọ 2014, o ritere Kodio Grand Prize na Clap'Ivoir festival na Ivory Coast maka ihe nkiri ya Les nanas benz, les reines du textiles
N'afọ 2016, o mere ihe nkiri Pacte, nke e mepụtara n'enweghị mkparịta ụka ka ahọpụtara na Pan-African Film and Television Festival of Ouagadougou (FESPACO) n'afọ 2017.
